ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
ESRS reference
ESRS 2 GOV-1
Key terms
Categorisation of the general meeting
Background
Annex II of the ESRS defines ‘administrative, management and supervisory bodies’ as follows: ‘The
governance bodies with the highest decision-making authority in the undertaking including its
committees. If in the governance structure there are no members of the administrative,
